version_description:
1 optimize the painting function, the new year painting is no longer afraid of crooked.
2 to solve the problem of measuring errors in the measurement process.
The 3 side edge measurement camera support.
4 other interface optimization.

Should be the majority of user requirements, require the removal of the use of the number of restrictions, the new version removed no problem!!!
Other details fix:
1 solve measurement error
2 increase feedback
3 interface optimization

Important update:
[function]:
New "noise meter" function - through the phone to detect the surrounding sound decibel
[repair bug]:
Mobile phone in the "zoom" view, the measurement error
What are you waiting for?!!!

Thank you very much for your feedback and user feedback to update the following functions:
1 a transparent, make the measurement more convenient
2 noise meter on the 5S phone font display problems
3 add new features
Due to the reasons for the development of time, as well as some of the views of users, in this version is not updated, we will then be screened, add priority!
Thank you for your support, welcome to our products more valuable advice!

leileleile，那个完美支持iPad版本尺子它leile~
更新划重点：
1.新增气压计、海拔高度
2.iPad、iPhone X适配
3.修复尺子在’放大视图‘下测量误差问题
4.界面细节修改
更多更新细节请下载最新版，惊喜等着你哦~
非常感谢群里朋友与网上用户的意见反馈，谢谢大家，具体人员太多，不一一感谢了。

leile，leile，紧急bug修复
1.测量距离无效
2.iPhone X适配测量距离功能
3.iPad Pro 10.5使用尺子闪退

感谢用户的及时反馈
测量距离优化，了解一下？
谢谢~

1.增加推送通知开关按钮，现在您可以通过点击左边侧边栏将推送通知关闭哦~

谢谢，非常感谢您的宝贵意见，您的每次评价，我们都会认真查看并改正。
